About Me

I am a junior student at UM-SJTU Joint Institute, Shanghai Jiao Tong University, majoring in Electrical and Computer Engineering, minoring in Data Science. I am doing research on soft matter physics in Qu Lab.

I love anime, music, and physics.

Research Interests

  • Soft Matter Physics
  • Hydrodynamics
  • Biophysics

Publications

  1. Programmable Boundary Deformation Control in Active Networks [Manuscript in progress]
    Zixiang Lin, Shichen Liu, Shahriar Shadkhoo, Jialong Jiang, Heun Jin Lee, Rob Phillips, Matt Thomsonc, Zijie Quc

  2. Hydrodynamic Interaction and Geometric Memory Effect Drive Directed Swimming of Chlamydomonas reinhardtii near Periodic Microstructures
    Chunhe Li, Hongyi Bian, Zixiang Lin, Yi Man, Zijie Quc
    arXiv, 2025.
